description: Creates volumetric datasets marking voxels based on their location relative to a surface

grid_parent.title: Grid Parent
grid_parent.description: Specifies the grid for the output volume.

fill_method.title: Fill Method
fill_method.description: Fill method: SLOW or FAST (default: FAST).

mask_only.title: Mask Only
mask_only.description: Produce an output dataset where voxels are 1 inside the surface and 0 outside.

flip_orientation.title: Flip Orientation
flip_orientation.description: Flip triangle winding of surface mesh.

no_distance.title: No Distance
no_distance.description: Do not compute the distances, just the mask from the first step.
